name: Ghost Dog's Crappy Adventure - Finndition
description:
"Oh wow im a dog" - Ghost Dog, 2018

Yeah this games got it all. Action? No, Radical Soda didn't teach me how to do that, and this is my first Rpg maker game. Adventure? You bet your ass there's adventure. Puzzles? Yeah I guess so... Anyways this game's top dollah. You'll be playing it and then playing it 3 more times to get all 4 endings!
